doc.after: Wikimedia currently runs on dedicated clusters of Linux servers (mainly Ubuntu),.[35][36] As of December 2009[update], there were 300 in Florida and 44 in Amsterdam.[37] Wikipedia employed a single server until 2004, when the server setup was expanded into a distributed multitier architecture. In January 2005, the project ran on 39 dedicated servers in Florida.[citation needed] This configuration included a single master database server running MySQL, multiple slave database servers, 21 web servers running the Apache HTTP Server, and seven Squid cache servers.
